presentation_title: AURA Air: Redefining Private Aviation for the Modern Traveler

title_slide.title: AURA Air: Redefining Private Aviation for the Modern Traveler

slides.title: Air Travel Is Broken
slides.body:
• Commercial flights suffer from chronic delays and cancellations.
• Impersonal service and crowded spaces define the experience.
• Inefficient routes waste valuable executive time and money.
slides.image_prompt: Black and white photo of a long, chaotic queue of frustrated travelers in a crowded airport terminal.

slides.title: The AURA Experience
slides.body:
• Seamless on-demand booking via a members-only app.
• Depart from private terminals, avoiding airport chaos.
• Personalized, pilot-led service focused on safety and comfort.
slides.image_prompt: Sunlight streaming into the pristine, luxurious interior of a modern private jet with plush leather seats.

slides.title: A $32B+ Market
slides.body:
• Target Addressable Market (TAM) - $32.1B in global private aviation.
• Serviceable Addressable Market (SAM) - $9.5B for U.S. corporate and leisure charter.
• Serviceable Obtainable Market (SOM) - $50M targeting underserved Midwest/West Coast routes in Year 3.

slides.title: Why We Win
slides.body:
• Asset-Light Model - We lease new, fuel-efficient aircraft, reducing capital costs.
• Tech-First Platform - Superior booking and logistics management cuts overhead by 20%.
• Pilot-Founder Culture - Unmatched commitment to operational excellence and safety.
slides.image_prompt: A sharp, confident female pilot in a modern uniform giving a pre-flight briefing to business travelers beside a jet.

slides.title: Flexible Revenue Streams
slides.body:
• AURA Access - Annual membership for preferred rates and priority booking.
• On-Demand Charter - Pay-as-you-fly for non-members at market rates.
• Corporate Accounts - Packaged flight hours for enterprise clients.
slides.image_prompt: A clean, minimalist infographic showing three revenue streams with icons for a membership card, a plane, and a briefcase.

slides.title: Modern Efficient Aircraft
slides.body:
• Our fleet features the Pilatus PC-24 and Embraer Phenom 300E.
• These jets offer best-in-class range, efficiency, and comfort.
slides.image_prompt: Cinematic wide shot of a sleek Pilatus PC-24 jet on the tarmac during a golden hour sunset, reflecting the vibrant sky.

slides.title: Early Traction
slides.body:
• 25+ Letters of Intent from corporate and high-net-worth clients.
• Waitlist of over 150 individuals for AURA Access membership.
slides.image_prompt: A clean logo wall featuring stylized, fictional logos for venture capital firms, tech companies, and wealth management groups.

slides.title: Competitive Edge
slides.body:
• NetJets (20% market share) - High cost from fractional ownership model | Our advantage: 30% lower hourly rates via our lease model.
• Wheels Up ($700M revenue) - Inconsistent service from a crowded marketplace | Our advantage: A curated, owned-experience fleet ensures quality.
• First Class - Limited routes and inflexible schedules | We fly point-to-point on your schedule.

slides.title: The Founding Team
slides.body:
• Alex Jensen, Founder & Chief Pilot - 15+ years as an Airline Transport Pilot, former USAF.
• Maria Flores, COO - Led operations at XOJET, scaled fleet by 40%.
• Ben Carter, CTO - Ex-Uber Elevate engineer, expert in logistics platforms.
• Chloe Davis, Head of Experience - Former Director of Hospitality at Four Seasons.

slides.title: Five-Year Outlook
slides.body:
• Year 1 - Launch with 2 aircraft, achieve $4M revenue.
• Year 3 - Expand to 8 aircraft, reach $25M revenue, achieve profitability.
• Year 5 - Operate 15+ aircraft, achieve $70M ARR with 22% EBITDA margin.
slides.image_prompt: A sleek, modern bar chart showing exponential revenue growth over five years, using the company's color palette of navy blue and gold.

slides.title: Our Investment Ask
slides.body:
$5 Million Seed Round
To secure aircraft leases, build out our technology platform, and fund operations for the first 18 months.

slides.title: Join Our Journey
slides.body:
